name: Deathstroke of Dungeons
description:
I'm developing this game with my cousin, he takes care of the artistic part and I do the programming part! Deathstroke of Dungeons, a game where you are a knight and enter a castle full of monsters and you have to defeat them. The story is still under construction, the bosses and enemies will go through changes later on and I intend to put a lot more things in the game like enemies, powerups, tutorials, item list and more things in the hud like showing how much damage is dealing to the enemy and make them stronger procedurally, along with the player who can get stronger. Die once and you'll restart the game from the beginning!! My cousin's instagram: @skull_bit My instagram: @eriick.monteiro

A little project in progress. The Final boss is a Bill Cypher (Iluminatti) because I don't a definity art of him yet, but his programation is finisshed!! Thank you for play my demo <3

CONTROLS OF LAST VERSION:

{

     "E" or "X (button on xbox control)" = change weapon;

     "W, A, S, D" or left analogic = move player;

     "T" = change Keyboard controls to XBox control;

     "Shift" or "LT (L2)" = defend;

     "ESC" or "START" = Pause game;

     "Left Click" or "RT (R2)" = Shoot/Attack;

}
